wordpressPage.title: Affirmation (What Do You Believe?)
wordpressPage.content:
For this you’ll need the song ‘Affirmation’ by Savage Garden (YouTube Link). You may also like to have the lyrics printed (Link)

1 – Play your group the song

2 – Do any of the lyrics jump out? Why?

3 – If you could come up with 1 ‘I believe’ statement about something that’s important to you what would you come up with?

Bible Input – Have a read of The Apostles Creed – Find it here

Explain that this is a widely used statement of ‘I believe’s’ by Christians.

4 – What do you think of it? Do you agree?
